headline: Chevron to Cut 600 Jobs in California, 700 in Houston by End of This Year -- OPIS
summary: Chevron expects to slash about 600 jobs in San Ramon, Calif., and around 700 in downtown Houston by the end of this year as part of its plans to restructure the company and cut costs, a spokeswoman...
